name: OjiWoji Demo
description:
a cute soon-to-be king starfish is thrown onto a path and must collect the gumbuzo chunks and survive falling rocks to keep his title. Help save him from his demise! 

Controls:

ControlsMouse and KeyboardGamepadMove CursorMouseRight Stick
SelectLeft Mouse ButtonAMove LeftKeyboard A Left Stick Left or Dpad LeftMove RightKeyboard DLeft Stick Right or Dpad Right

* There are touch controls, but only swipe and tap. (cursor is approximated)

Note from creator: This is a demo to show off the level of quality I strive to create and improve. Feedback is greatly appreciated, thank you!
